ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 91
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a question for all the higher level monks out there. I am of the 26th season and I was wondering, when you solo the aviak guards in Lake Rathe if you
ygData.messageBody:
I have a question for all the higher level monks out there. I am of the 26th
season and I was wondering, when you solo the aviak guards in Lake Rathe if
you need to feign death you can, then you can stand right back up and
bandage and continue on with the fight, my question is can you do the same
to aviaks in the aviak village, I was wondering because if you can that
means I can solo harriers instead of just rooks. Thank you for your time. Oh
by the way I bought my BP Choker last night, and now I am broke, but I am a
satisfied broke hehehe, and I also traded for a Shralok Pack for my opal
electrum necklace too.

-----Original Message-----
From: Steve Danuser [mailto:danu@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 12, 1999 7:49 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Digest Number 91


From: Steve Danuser <danu@...>

>So who knows how to make these Gauntlets of Wu?

Just look around on EQ sites that talk about tailoring.

_____________________________
Moorgard, monk striving for Virtue
Povar
